description:
Single orbital ground tracks of platform METOP-A, for Advanced Very High Resolution Radiometer (AVHRR) instrument.
The product displays the path that the satellite "draws" on the surface of Earth while moving in a geosynchronous orbit.
From every single orbit it is possible to access to all the Product Dissemination Units (PDUs) included in that orbit.
Each PDU contains 3 minutes of measurements. There are approximately 33/34 PDUs per orbit.
For every PDU, the starting time is provided, in format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ.
title: Orbital Ground Tracks - Metop A

providers.name: European Organisation for the Exploitation of Meteorological Satellites (EUMETSAT)
